content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 18}, {"type": "egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 26}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 6, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft light_gray_wool, I need to craft white_wool first. To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings in the crafting table. I will first move the string from slot 27 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
